ModMetaData.name: Craft Mechtech Chips
ModMetaData.author: Nehr
ModMetaData.description:
Craft Signal chips, Powerfocus chips and Nano structuring chips.
Unlock the ability to craft mechtech chips through research after you've studied the chips. Instead of fighting the same bosses over and over again in order to get mechtech chips this mod gives you the option to also craft them.
This mod is safe to add and remove from your saves at any time.
Research time (requires Multi analyzer) Signal chip: 2000 Powerfocus chip: 4000 Nanostructuring chip: 6000
Crafting (with Fabrication bench) costs Signal chip: Steel (50), Plasteel (125), Gold (10), Uranium (5) Powerfocus chip: Steel (60), Plasteel (200), Gold (50), Signal chip (2) Nano structuring chip: Steel (80), Plasteel (250), Gold (100), Uranium (10), Powerfocus chip (2)
Skills needed to craft Signal chip: 9 crafting (can be crafted by fabricators) Powerfocus chip: 10 crafting (can be crafted by fabricators) Nano structuring chip: 10 crafting, 16 intellectual (must be crafted by a colonist)
